nodes.text: TC-326 was a protocol droid that served the Republic during the Clone Wars.

TC-326 was first seen walking by a Nu-class attack shuttle on Geonosis. Shortly after the Second Battle of Geonosis, he aided in translation during the debriefing of Poggle the Lesser by Jedi Masters Luminara Unduli, Obi-Wan Kenobi and Ki-Adi-Mundi. He later witnessed Jedi Knight Anakin Skywalker physically strike Poggle and Force-choke him until he surrendered and gave the information Skywalker sought.
TC-326 had gray plating with yellow stripes on its head and arms and the symbol of the Open Circle Fleet on its chest.
TC-326 was voiced by James Arnold Taylor in the series, the same actor who provided the voice for Obi-Wan Kenobi.
